body:
I have a Shading System with Blinds for the window, and did an integrated Daylight and Energy simulation. But in the Daysim Simulation Report, under "ShadingControl", it shows "<font color="#000000">There is no dynamic shading system in the scene."</font>

<font color="#000000">It seems the Blinds are not working in the daylight simulation. And I can not find a Component for the setting. </font>
topic: How to integrate ShadingControl to daylight simulation

replies.body: I find two components "concepturalDynamicSHDRecipe" and "advancedDynamicSHDRecipe", the both have a "dynamicShadingGroup". But I can not find any Component to recive this output.
